com.namics.oss.spring.support.batch.autoconfigure

Class AutomaticJobRegistrarConfigurationSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.namics.oss.spring.support.batch.autoconfigure.SpringBatchSupportAutoConfiguration
      • com.namics.oss.spring.support.batch.autoconfigure.AutomaticJobRegistrarConfigurationSupport

  • @Configuration
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=SpringBatchSupportProperties.class)
 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value=SpringBatchSupportAutoConfiguration.class)
public class AutomaticJobRegistrarConfigurationSupport
extends SpringBatchSupportAutoConfiguration
    AutomaticJobRegistrarConfigurationSupport. This configuration looks for jobs in a modular fashion, meaning that every job configuration file gets its own Child-ApplicationContext.
    Since:
    03.07.17 15:38
    Author:
    lboesch, Namics AG
